title: How do I change the input method when editing a text message?
answer:
Create a text message and touch the text field to bring up the onscreen keyboard. The default input method is Huawei Swype. Swipe down on the screen to open the status bar, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109319), and select an input method. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109320)
